About

I am currently a year Dual Degree (BTech + MTech integrated) student in the Electrical Engineering Department, Indian Institute of Technology Madras (IIT-M). I am passionate about the fields of Computer Vision, Machine Learning and Signal Processing. I hope to do a PhD and become a researcher in the future (industry or academia). Please have a look at my Resume for futher details.
